title: AI Powered Communication Assistant
details: Developed an AI-driven chat workflow to streamline professional profile inquiries and automate context-aware follow-ups.
Implemented real-time AI notifications delivering inquiry details (name, email, and message summaries) for rapid response and engagement.
Built with LangChain, LangGraph, and LangServe, leveraging the supervisor architecture for multi-agent coordination.
Deployed a FastAPI backend as a Docker container on AWS App Runner, ensuring scalability and stateless concurrency handling.
Hosted the React + Vite frontend on Netlify, integrated securely with the AWS backend via CORS and environment-based API routing.
Managed environment variables, secrets, and deployment pipelines through AWS ECR, enabling reproducible and portable cloud builds.

title: Cosmetic Product Safety Analysis (Machine Learning & AI)
details: Developed a Python-based data analysis pipeline to detect harmful synthetic ingredients in marketed 'clean' beauty products.
Integrated a safety scoring system (0â€“10) into the pipeline to quantify ingredient risk levels across multiple datasets.
Created data visualizations to reveal a 73% discrepancy between product marketing claims and actual ingredient safety.
Collaborated in a 3-person team to ensure model accuracy and reproducibility through well-documented scripts and pipelines.

title: Portfolio Website
details: Built with React, React Router DOM, and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations and transitions.
Implemented dark and light mode toggle with default theme settings.
Designed a mobile-first, responsive UI with a clean and modern layout.
Structured content via easily editable JSON configuration files for scalability and flexibility.
Hosted the website on Netlify, allowing for continuous builds and update pipeline.
